oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stéphane COUTIN
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: B2SAFE repository package is a set of software application and components. It provides an easy to deploy interface for a data repository to replicate its data objects into EUDAT B2SAFE. In the zip file, you will find the runnable jar program and the product documentation. Some further information and the source files are available on github at http://eudat-b2safe.github.io/B2SAFE-repository-package/
